overview: Alexandre is a young Brazilian entrepreneur, passionate about software development and education. He is an active and enthusiastic participant in tech communities and forums, promoting the sharing of knowledge widely and democratically. As a speaker, he participated in over a hundred conferences related to free software, agile development, entrepreneurship, open government and data, lean startup, as well as in acceleration programs and mentoring for startups. Worked in small, medium and large companies, national and international, and for 10 years, maintains his own business (seatecnologia.com.br), working systematically in providing innovative solutions for the Brazilian public and private organizations.
